Description
Feature Highlights:

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch! Buy once, run on all your devices! iOS 5.0 and up! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Support for sound/music redirection from your Mac and easy setup without port-forwarding / dynamic DNS with RemoterFusion add-on
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Support for RDP (even Windows 8) (and NLA), SSH and Telnet, VNC over SSH, RDP over SSH, and arbitrary SSH port tunnels via In-App purchases

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Virtual TrackPad allows for precise and intuitive control! right-click, dragging and scrolling! Four trackpad modes (New: thumb friendly trackpad)

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ UltraVNC MS Login Support, Server-Side Scaling and Multiple Monitor support
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Wake-on-Lan Support 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Bonjour and NetBIOS computer discovery 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Supports BOTH Landscape and Portrait orientations 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Intuitive Pinch to Zoom and drag to scroll. Also presets: "Fit Height", "Fit Width" and "1:1" 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Special Keys: Including: Esc, Tab, Alt, Up, Down, Right, Left, PageUp, PageDown, F1..F12, Control-Alt-Delete, Command, Windows-key, etc 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Fullscreen mode 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Clipboard synchronization (Paste is universal, but copy requires server support)

What's New in Version 4.6.01
Bug Fixes and Enhancements:
-Ask user if they want to restore rectangle.
-One finger tap: menu / Two finger: start Can now be configured in Remoter config.
-Fixed Help screen popover size on iPad.
-Re-enabled keyboard transparency. Might not work in all cases in iOS7.
-Added support for SSH Dynamic SOCKS-based port forwarding.
-Removed status bar when in Full Screen mode
-Replaced connection wait alert with HUD.
